items.sentence: Let\'s see what the doctor has to say before we make any decisions.
She advised him to give up smoking, but he wouldn\'t listen to her.
Tom wanted Mary\'s phone number, but she refused to give it to him.
His wife is in the hospital because she was injured in a car crash.
French was the only foreign language that they taught at my school.
I thought that you said you\'d like to know why Tom had to do that.
Just ignore Tom. He always seems to be complaining about something.
More than one million tons of coal are mined each day in Australia.
She hated him so much that our family could never go and visit him.
I had never been abroad before, so everything seemed strange to me.
